question: 27. A memory connected to a microprocessor has 20 address lines and 16 data lines. What will be the memory capacity?
answer:
Answer: b
Explanation: Total number of locations of the memory possible for 20 address lines is 2
20
and every location has 16/8 = 2 bytes. So, total memory capacity will be 2
20
× 2 = 2 MB.
